text: <Middangeard> mid þæm leoman þæs halgan geleafan mildheortlice wearð gefylled þurh Godes gyfe, þe on ecnesse libbende eallu þinc endemes ætg<../images/etail.gif>dre geworhte, & eal þæt mid gecyndelicum hiwe on foresceawudum tidum synderlice to cyþþe & geswutulunge brohte.

& se mæra Wyrhta þe rihsigende wylt & gemetegaþ eal þæt he geworhte, no be þ<../images/etail.gif>m anum lætan wolde, ac eornostlice ofer þone garsecg þone ylecan leoman þæs fullan geleafan aspringan let, & fornean þæt ytemeste iglond ealles middangeardes, mid Ongolcynne genihtsumlice gefylled, wundorfullice anlyhte & mærsode.

Soðlice þæt ylece iglond, on ærum tydum mid æþengilde afylled, þearle swiþe beswicyn, deofolgilde þeowude; þeahhwæþere þurh fultum þære þancweorþan Cristes gyfe & þurh sanctum Gregorium, þæs <Romanisces> setles bisceop, fram þæm þystrum heora geleafleaste wearþ genered.
Mid gewisse se foresæda bisceop þurh myndgunge þære halgan Godes gyfe angan æt suman cyrre <to> befrinenne sume inlendisce ymbe þæs iglondes gewunan & hwæþer hi Cristene wæron.

He wearð æfter þysse æscan swa swiþe mid þære blæsan soþere lufe ontend, þæt he swa wuldorfulle & Gode swa welweorþe leode geneosian & gefaran wolde, & mid lare & gebysnunge þæs soþan geleafan & mid þweale þæs halgan fulluhtes þurh hine sylfne geclænsian wolde.
Him forebod com fram eallum Romanum þæt he þæt fær beginnan moste, ne him swa gecweme & swa licwyrþe folc gefaran.

He þeah sanctum Agustinum, þæt getreowuste bearn þæs halgan geleafan, him to gespelian funde, & hine hider asende, þæt he swa þæslic folc & him swa gecweme ælmihtegum Drihtne geornfullice gestrynde, & embe þa gestreon swiþe gecneord wære.

He georne þone his gespelian þurh ærendracan manode & lærde þæt he georne mynstra timbryde Criste to lofe & weorþunge, & þæm Godes þeowum þone ylecan þeaw tæhte & gesette þe þa apostolas mid heora <geferrædene> on þæm anginne ures Cristendomes heoldon: him eallum wæs an heorte & an saul, ne heora nan syndrige æhta næfde, ne þæt furþum ne gecwæþ þæt he ænige hæfde, ac ealle þing heom gemæne wæron.
Þæs sylfa þeaw forþy lange þurh myndgunge þæs halgan weres on Angelcynnes mynsterum forþweard wæs & wel þeonde.
<Ac>.
<Understod> & wiste getreowne dyhtnere his <halegra> cyricena ær he gewurþe mannum geswutolod.
He him forþy mænigfealde & genihtsume æhta & <mihta> gesealde.
Ne he lange ne elcode ne mihta ne ofteah.

N<../images/etail.gif>s lang to þy þæt his broþor þyses lænan lifes timan geendode, se þurh his cildhades nytenesse þis rice tostencte & his annesse todælde, & eac swa halegra cyricena land incuþum reaferum todælde.

Æfter his forðsiþe Eadgar, se foresæda cynincg, þurh Godes gyfe ealne Angelcynnes anweald begeat & þæs rices twislunge eft to annesse brohte, & swa gesundlice ealles weold þæt þa þe on æran timan lifes w<../images/etail.gif>ron & his hyldran gemundon & heora dæda gefyrn tocneowan, þearle swiþe wundredon & wafiende cwædon: Hit is la formicel Godes wunder þæt þysum cildgeongum cynincge þus gesundfullice eallu þing underþeodde synt on his cynelicum anwealde; his foregengan, þe geþungene wæron on ylde & on gleawscype swiþe bescawede & forewittige, <&> on ænegum gewinne earfoþwylde, næfre þisne andweald on swa micelre sibbe smyltnesse gehealdan ne mihton, naþor ne mid gefeohte, ne mid scette.
Ac nis no to wundrienne swylce hit ungewunlic sy þonne God ælmihtig mærlice leanaþ æghwylcum þara þe him god behet & þæt eft fullice gelæst.
Drihten Crist is þearle swiþe on þysum þingum mid ealles modes gledscype to herienne.

Soþlice ælmihtig <Drihten>, þe is ealra þinga gewita, þe on ær wat eal þæt toweard is, þe wiste hu fremful he beon wolde, him æfre swiþe milde w<../images/etail.gif>s, & ealle god him symle fremfullice towearde dyde; swylce se rihtwisa & se arf<../images/etail.gif>sta leangyfa no mid wordum ac mid dædum bodede, & þus cwæde: Nu þu minne naman and anwald -- þæt is, mine cyricean þe ic rihtlice on minum synderlicum andwealde hæbbe -- georne friþast & fyrþrast, ic þe to leanes þinne noman mærsige & þin rice þe þu under minum andwealde hyltst geeacnige & mid gode fyrþrige.
Hwa is monna on Angelcynne wuniende þæt nyte hu he Godes rice, þæt is Godes cyricean, ægþær ge mid gastlicum gode ge mid woroldcundum eallum <mægene> fyrþrode & friþode?
Witodlice sona swa he to his cynedome gecoren wearþ, wæs swiþe gemundige his behates þe he on his æþelincghade cildgeong Gode behet & sancta Marian, þa se abbod hine gelaþode to þæm munuclife.

Ealswa we wiþufan cwædon, þurh þæs gehates myngunge, swiþe geþancol on anginne his rices began þa stowe to fyrþrienne ealswa he ær behet on his cildgeogoðe, & mid eallum þingum godode to þan swiþe þæt heo næs na neoþor ne waccere þonne formænig þara þe his yldran ær gefyrþredon on langsumum fæce.
He þær sona getimbrian het mærlic mynster on þreora geara fæce.
Þæt wile þincan ungeleaflic eallum þæm þe þa stowe on uferum tidum geseoð & þis ne gemunaþ.

He þæt ilce mynster þus gehradod het sancta Marian gehalgian Gode <to> <lofe> & to weorþunge, & þærto muneca micele <geferrædene> gesomnode to þæm þæt hy Gode hyrsumedon æfter tæcinge þæs halgan regules.
Ær þæm lyt <muneca> wæs on feawum stowum on swa miclum rice þe be rihtum regule lifdon.
N<../images/etail.gif>s þæt na fealdre þonne on are stowe, seo is Glæstingabyrig gehaten, ðær his fæder Eadmund cynincg munecas ærest gestaþolode.
Of þære stowe wæs se foresprecena abbud genumen & gehadod to þæm foresædan mynstre þe Eadgar cyning gestaþolode & mid munecum gesette.
He þearle swiþe wearþ gegladod þurh þæt gastlice munyca angin, & geornlice angan to smeagenne ærest þinga hu he his agen lif gerihtlæcan meahte mid rihtre æf<../images/etail.gif>stnesse.
Hit eac swa on bocum awriten is: Se þe god beginnan þence, he þæt angin on him sylfum astelle.
Æfter þam þe he sylf geriht wearð, began georne mynstera wide geond his cynerice to rihtlæcynne, & Godes þeowdom to arærenne.

Þæt swa wearð gelæst þurh þa fultumigendan Godes gife: breac þa gesinlice Dunstanes his ercebisceopes rædes; þurh his myndgunge he w<../images/etail.gif>s smeagende embe his saule hæle, & no þæt an, ac eac swylce be <ealre> æfæstnesse & gesundfulnesse his andwealdes.
Halige stowa he geclænsode fram ealra manna fulnessum, no þæt an on Wesseaxna rice, ac eac swylce on Myrcena lande.
Witodlice he adref <canonicas> þe on þæm foresædum gyltum <oferflede> genihtsumedon, & on þam fyrmestum stowum <ealles> his anwealdes munecas gestaþolode to weorþfulre þenunge Hælendes Cristes.
An sumum stowum eac swilce he mynecæna gestaþolode and þa <Ælfþryþe> his gebeddan bet<../images/etail.gif>hte, þæt heo æt ælcere neode hyra gehulpe.
He sylf w<../images/etail.gif>s a smeagende ymb muneca gesundfulnesse, & welwillende hi to þam myngode þæt heo hine geefenlæcende on þa ilcan wisan ymbe mynecæna hogode.

He began mid geornfulre scrudnunge smeagan & ahsian be þam gebodum þæs halgan regules, & witan wolde þæs sylfan regules lare, þurh þa biþ gegearwod rihtes lifes gewuna & arwyrþe gewilnung, & þa gesetednessa þe to halgum mægenum wæmaþ.
He wolde eac swylce þurh þone regul oncnawan þa wislican gefadunge þe snotorlice geset is be incuþra <ðinga> endebyrdnesse.
Þurh þises wisdomes lust he het þisne regul of læden gereorde on englisc geþeodan.

Þeah þa scearpþanclan witan þe þone twydæledan wisdom hlutorlice tocnawaþ -- þæt is andweardra þinga & gastlicra wisdom -- & þara ægþer eft on þrim todalum gelyfedlice wunaþ -- þisse engliscan geþeodnesse ne behofien, is þeah niedbehefe ungelæredum woroldmonnum <þe> for helle wites ogan & for Cristes lufan þis earmfulle lif forlætaþ & to hyra Drihtne gecyrrað & þone halgan þeowdom þises regules geceosaþ; þy læs þe ænig <ungecyrred> woroldman mid nytnesse & ungewitte regules geboda abræce & þære tale bruce <þæt> he þy dæge misfenge þy he hit selre nyste.
Ic <þonne> geþeode to micclan gesceade telede.
Wel mæg <dugan> <hit> <naht> mid hwylcan gereorde mon sy gestryned & to þan soþan geleafan gewæmed, butan þæt an sy þæt he Gode gegange.
Hæbben forþi þa ungelæredan inlendisce þæs halgan regules cyþþe þurh agenes gereordes anwrigennesse, þæt hy þe geornlicor Gode þeowien and nane tale næbben þæt hy þurh nytennesse misfon þurfen.
Forþi, þonne, ic mid ealre estfulnesse mine æftergengan bidde & þurh Drihtnes naman halsige, þæt hy þyses halgan regules bigenc a þurh Cristes gife geycen, & godiende to fulfremedum ende gebrencgen.

Ne gedyrstlæce heora nan þurh deofles myndgunge <oþþe> <þurh> ænige gitsunge þæt he Godes are gewanige oþþe ænigre incan sece hu heo gewanod weorþe, oþþe on landare oþþe on ænegum oþrum æhtum, þe læs þe þurh wædle & hæfenleaste þære halgan æfestnesse welm awlacige and mid ealle acolige.
Þæt la næfre ne gelumpe.
Þæs þe ic wene, sio æf<../images/etail.gif>stnes þæs halgan regules on ærum tidum gewanod wearþ þurh reaflac yfelra manna, & þurh geþafunge þara cynenga þe to Gode lytelne ege hæfdon.
Is swiþe miclan us eallum to warnienne & ure Drihten to biddenne, þæt sio yrmþ on ure æfestnesse næfre eft ne geweorðe.

Abbodissum we eac tæcaþ þæt hi inholde sin and þæs halgan regoles <gebodum> eallum mode <þeowigen>, and Godes ælmihtiges <bebode> beodaþ, þæt heora nan ne gedyrstlæce þæt hi Godes landare naþor ne heora magum ne woroldricum mid ungesceade sellen, ne for sceatte ne lyffetunge.
Geþencen þæt hi Gode to hyrdum sin gesette, & no to reafrum.

Gif heora hwilc, mid deofles costnunge beswicen, for Gode oþþe for worulde gyltig biþ, ne gladige on þæt noþer ne cyning ne worulrica, swilce him gerymed sy & antimber geseald þæt he God bereafige, þe þa æhta ah, & n<../images/etail.gif>nne gylt næfre ne geworhte; ne sy la nan eorðcund cyning mid gitsunge to þæm swiþe undergan þæt he þæm heofoncundum cyninge þe hine geworhte ne læte beon þæs ylecan rihtes weorþne þe he sylf is.
Gif cinges gerefena hwylc gyltig biþ wiþ Gode oþþe wiþ men, hwa is manna to þam ungescead and ungewittig þæt he þæm cyninge his are ætrecce forþi þe his gerefa <forwyrht> biþ?
Stande forþi on þæt ilice gerad on ecnesse swa hwæt swa þæm ecum Criste geseald biþ on cyricena æhtum.
Gif hwa to þæm gedyrstig biþ þæt he þis on oþer awende, he biþ ungesælig on ecum tintragum gewitnad.
Þæt la ne geweorþe þæt minra æftergengenna ænig þa yrmþe geearnige!
